description: Integer overflow in the SOAPParameter object constructor in (1) Netscape version 7.0 and 7.1 and (2) Mozilla 1.6, and possibly earlier versions, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0722

description: Heap-based buffer overflow in the SendUidl in the POP3 capability for Mozilla before 1.7, Firefox before 0.9, and Thunderbird before 0.7, may allow remote POP3 mail servers to execute arbitrary code.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0757

description: Mozilla 1.5 through 1.7 allows a CA certificate to be imported even when their DN is the same as that of the built-in CA root certificate, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service to SSL pages because the malicious certificate is treated as invalid.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0758

description: Mozilla before 1.7 allows remote web servers to read arbitrary files via Javascript that sets the value of an <input type="file"> tag.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0759

description: Mozilla allows remote attackers to cause Mozilla to open a URI as a different MIME type than expected via a null character (%00) in an FTP URI.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0760

description: Mozilla before 1.7, Firefox before 0.9, and Thunderbird before 0.7, allow remote attackers to use certain redirect sequences to spoof the security lock icon that makes a web page appear to be encrypted.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0761

description: Mozilla before 1.7, Firefox before 0.9, and Thunderbird before 0.7, allow remote web sites to install arbitrary extensions by using interactive events to manipulate the XPInstall Security dialog box.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0762

description: Mozilla Firefox 0.9.1 and 0.9.2 allows remote web sites to spoof certificates of trusted web sites via redirects and Javascript that uses the "onunload" method.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0763

description: Mozilla before 1.7, Firefox before 0.9, and Thunderbird before 0.7, allow remote web sites to hijack the user interface via the "chrome" flag and XML User Interface Language (XUL) files.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0764

description: The cert_TestHostName function in Mozilla before 1.7, Firefox before 0.9, and Thunderbird before 0.7, only checks the hostname portion of a certificate when the hostname portion of the URI is not a fully qualified domain name (FQDN), which allows remote attackers to spoof trusted certificates.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0766

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0767

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0769

description: The (1) Mozilla 1.6, (2) Firebird 0.7 and (3) Firefox 0.8 web browsers do not properly verify that cached passwords for SSL encrypted sites are only sent via SSL encrypted sessions to the site, which allows a remote attacker to cause a cached password to be sent in cleartext to a spoofed site.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0779

description: Format string vulnerability in CDE Mailer (dtmail) on Solaris 8 and 9 allows local users to gain privileges via format strings in the argv[0] value.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0819

description: Winamp before 5.0.4 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary script in the Local computer zone via script in HTML files that are referenced from XML files contained in a .wsz skin file.

description: Sygate Secure Enterprise (SSE) 3.5MR3 and earlier does not change the key used to encrypt data, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (resource exhaustion) by capturing a session and repeatedly replaying the session.

description: Buffer overflow in the JPEG (JPG) parsing engine in the Microsoft Graphic Device Interface Plus (GDI+) component, GDIPlus.dll, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code via a JPEG image with a small JPEG COM field length that is normalized to a large integer length before a memory copy operation.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0200

description: Buffer overflow in the child_service function in the ident2 ident daemon allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0408

description: The mysqlhotcopy script in mysql 4.0.20 and earlier, when using the scp method from the mysql-server package, allows local users to overwrite arbitrary files via a symlink attack on temporary files.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2004-0457
